trans-unit.source: Represents the SQL spatial functions for the SQL client.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SQL 客户端的 SQL 空间函数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of a geography instance augmented with any Z (elevation) and M (measure) values carried by the instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回地理实例（通过由该实例执行的任何 Z（提升）和 M（度量）扩充）的“打开地理空间联合会 (OGC) 知名文本 (WKT)”表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of a geography instance augmented with any Z (elevation) and M (measure) values carried by the instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回地理实例（通过由该实例执行的任何 Z（提升）和 M（度量）扩充）的“打开地理空间联合会 (OGC) 知名文本 (WKT)”表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of a geography instance.
trans-unit.target: 地理实例中的 Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) “熟知文本” (WKT) 的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The geometry value.
trans-unit.target: 几何值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of a geography instance augmented with any Z (elevation) and M (measure) values carried by the instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回地理实例（通过由该实例执行的任何 Z（提升）和 M（度量）扩充）的“打开地理空间联合会 (OGC) 知名文本 (WKT)”表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of a geometry instance.
trans-unit.target: 几何实例中的 Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) “熟知文本” (WKT) 的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a geometric object representing the union of all point values whose distance from an instance is less than or equal to a specified value, allowing for a specified tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示所有点值的联合从一个实例的距离小于或等于指定的值的一个几何对象，允许指定的公差。

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: The distance.
trans-unit.target: 距离。

trans-unit.source: The specified tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 指定的容差。

trans-unit.source: Specifying whether the tolerance value is relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: 指定公差值是否是相对的或绝对的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a geometric object representing the union of all point values whose distance from a geography instance is less than or equal to a specified value, allowing for a specified tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示所有点值的联合从地理实例的距离小于或等于指定的值的一个几何对象，允许指定的公差。

trans-unit.source: The union of all point values whose distance from a geography instance is less than or equal to a specified value
trans-unit.target: 所有点值的联合从地理实例的距离小于或等于指定的值

trans-unit.source: The geometry value.
trans-unit.target: 几何值。

trans-unit.source: The distance.
trans-unit.target: 距离。

trans-unit.source: The specified tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 指定的容差。

trans-unit.source: Specifying whether the tolerance value is relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: 指定公差值是否是相对的或绝对的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a geometric object representing the union of all point values whose distance from a geometry instance is less than or equal to a specified value, allowing for a specified tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示所有点值的联合从几何图形实例的距离小于或等于指定的值的一个几何对象，允许指定的公差。

trans-unit.source: The union of all point values whose distance from a geometry instance is less than or equal to a specified value
trans-unit.target: 所有点值的联合从几何图形实例的距离小于或等于指定的值

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum angle between the point returned by EnvelopeCenter() and a point in the geography instance in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 EnvelopeCenter（）返回的点之间的最大角度和在地理事例的点之间程度。

trans-unit.source: the maximum angle between the point returned by EnvelopeCenter().
trans-unit.target: 由 EnvelopeCenter（） 返回的点之间的最大角度。

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a point that can be used as the center of a bounding circle for the geography instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用作跳起圆形的中心为地理实例的点。

trans-unit.source: A SqlGeography value that specifies the location of the center of a bounding circle.
trans-unit.target: 指定圆形边框的中心位置的 SqlGeography 值。

trans-unit.source: Offers a fast, index-only intersection method to determine if a geography instance intersects another SqlGeography instance, assuming an index is available.
trans-unit.target: 提供快速的、只索引交集方法来决定地理实例是否与其他 SqlGeography 实例相交（假设索引可用）。

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: Another geography instance to compare against the instance on which Filter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 根据调用的筛选器中的实例比较另一个地理实例。

trans-unit.source: Offers a fast, index-only intersection method to determine if a geography instance intersects another SqlGeography instance, assuming an index is available.
trans-unit.target: 提供快速的、只索引交集方法来决定地理实例是否与其他 SqlGeography 实例相交（假设索引可用）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if a geography instance potentially intersects another SqlGeography instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果地理实例存在可能与另一个 SqlGeography 实例相交，则 <see langword="True" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The geometry value.
trans-unit.target: 几何值。

trans-unit.source: Another geography instance to compare against the instance on which Filter is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 根据调用的筛选器中的实例比较另一个地理实例。

trans-unit.source: Offers a fast, index-only intersection method to determine if a geography instance intersects another SqlGeometry instance, assuming an index is available.
trans-unit.target: 提供快速的、只索引交集方法来决定地理实例是否与其他 SqlGeometry 实例相交（假设索引可用）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if a geography instance potentially intersects another SqlGeography instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果地理实例存在可能与另一个 SqlGeography 实例相交，则 <see langword="True" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the SqlGeography instance is the same as the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 测试 SqlGeography 实例是否与指定的类型相同。

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies one of the 12 types exposed in the geography type hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定以地理类型层次公开的 12 种类型之一的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the SqlGeography instance is the same as the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 测试 SqlGeography 实例是否与指定的类型相同。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies one of the 12 types exposed in the geography type hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定以地理类型层次公开的 12 种类型之一的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The geometry value.
trans-unit.target: 几何值。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies one of the 12 types exposed in the geography type hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定以地理类型层次公开的 12 种类型之一的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the SqlGeometry instance is the same as the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 测试 SqlGeometry 实例是否与指定的类型相同。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies one of the 12 types exposed in the geography type hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定以地理类型层次公开的 12 种类型之一的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The geometry value.
trans-unit.target: 几何值。

trans-unit.source: Converts an invalid geometry instance into a geometry instance with a valid Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) type.
trans-unit.target: 将无效的几何图形实例转换为使用有效 Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) 类型的几何图形实例。

trans-unit.source: The converted geometry instance.
trans-unit.target: 转换的几何图形实例。

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total number of rings in a Polygon instance.
trans-unit.target: 多边形实例中返回环总数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of rings.
trans-unit.target: 环总数。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the Point being generated.
trans-unit.target: 正在生成的点的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the Point being generated
trans-unit.target: 正在生成的点的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The SRID of the geography instance.
trans-unit.target: 地理实例的 SRID。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a geography instance representing a Point instance from its x and y values and a spatial reference ID (SRID).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个表示从其的 x 和 y 的值及空间引用 ID (SRID) 中的点实例的地理实例。

trans-unit.source: The constructed geography instance.
trans-unit.target: 构造的地理实例。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the Point being generated.
trans-unit.target: 正在生成的点的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the Point being generated
trans-unit.target: 正在生成的点的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The SRID of the geography instance.
trans-unit.target: 地理实例的 SRID。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a geometry instance representing a Point instance from its x and y values and a spatial reference ID (SRID).
trans-unit.target: 构造一个表示从其的 x 和 y 的值及空间引用 ID (SRID) 中的点实例的几何图形实例。

trans-unit.source: The constructed geometry instance.
trans-unit.target: 构造的几何图形实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns an approximation of the given geography instance produced by running the Douglas-Peucker algorithm on the instance with the given tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过在具有给定公差的实例上运行 Douglas-Peucker 算法而产生的给定地理实例的近似值。

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: The tolerance to input to the Douglas-Peucker algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要输入到 Douglas-Peucker 算法的容错。

trans-unit.source: tolerance must be a positive number.
trans-unit.target: 容错必须为正数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an approximation of the given geography instance produced by running the Douglas-Peucker algorithm on the instance with the given tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过在具有给定公差的实例上运行 Douglas-Peucker 算法而产生的给定地理实例的近似值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.Spatial.DbGeography" />。

trans-unit.source: The geometry value.
trans-unit.target: 几何值。

trans-unit.source: The tolerance to input to the Douglas-Peucker algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要输入到 Douglas-Peucker 算法的容错。

trans-unit.source: tolerance must be a positive number.
trans-unit.target: 容错必须为正数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an approximation of the given geography instance produced by running the Douglas-Peucker algorithm on the instance with the given tolerance.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过在具有给定公差的实例上运行 Douglas-Peucker 算法而产生的给定地理实例的近似值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Data.Spatial.DbGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.Spatial.DbGeometry" />。

trans-unit.source: The geography value.
trans-unit.target: 地理值。

trans-unit.source: An int expression between 1 and the number of rings in a polygon instance.
trans-unit.target: 多边形实例中 1 和环数之间 int 表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified ring of the SqlGeography instance: 1 ≤ n ≤ NumRings().
trans-unit.target: 返回 SqlGeography 实例的指定圆环：1 ≤ n ≤ NumRings ()。

trans-unit.source: A SqlGeography object that represents the ring specified by n.
trans-unit.target: 表示由 n 指定的循环的的 SqlGeography 对象。
